settings.title: "Within the first few weeks, I noticed that all my old pimples had started to heal"
settings.subtitle: Imogen - Concern: Cheeks, Chin, Forehead
settings.text: "While I was excited to use The Skin Shark products, I was a bit worried that if it didn't work I would feel a bit exhausted from trying so many products. Within the first few weeks of using The Skin Shark I noticed that all my old pimples had started to heal." - Imogen

settings.title: "The Skin Shark feels amazing"
settings.subtitle: Tison. Concern: Face & Shoulders
settings.text: "The Skin Shark feels amazing. I have really dry and oily skin and I didn't see any major results straight away. But if you use product consistently, The Skin Shark works - you just gotta keep using it." - Tison

settings.title: "I had no expectations for it to work"
settings.subtitle: Kayla - Concern: Cheeks & Chin
settings.text: "When I first started using The Skin Shark, I had no expectations for it to work. But overall I was pretty pleased with the results that I got. The product felt very hydrating on my skin, lightweight and moisturising" - Kayla

settings.title: Shark's join the fight against acne
settings.text: Over the past 400 million years, sharks’ immune systems have evolved to become free radical fighting machines. Their bile salts are one the most potent free radical fighters in the living world. It was this discovery that led The Skin Shark team to create a breakthrough man-made ingredient that would change the lives of those suffering acne-prone skin forever.

settings.preTitle: A BREAKTHROUGH INGREDIENT FOR ACNE-PRONE SKIN
settings.title: 5Beta-Scymnol
settings.text: Through the use of biotechnology, The Skin Shark have spent the last decade creating our patented ingredient, 5Beta-Scymnol. A 100% man-made marine salt-complex that dives deep to normalise oil production and stops blemishes in their tracks.

settings.title: What is The Skin Shark Serum?
settings.text:
This one-step serum is designed for everyday use on blemish prone or oily skin. 

It restores your skin’s ecosystem naturally and is a triple threat against bacteria, irritated skin and excess oils.

settings.title: How do I use the product?
settings.text: We recommend still using your cleanser prior to applying your Skin Shark Clearing Serum twice a day, morning and night. Our serum is packed with ingredients that are hydrating to the skin which means this product is suitable to replace your daily moisturiser if needed. The Spot Treatment can also be added into your current routine and applied on new spots/blemishes.

settings.title: How long will it take to clear my skin?
settings.text:
We all have different skin and will therefore see different results. 

For optimum results we recommend sticking to your new routine for a minimum of 6 weeks. 

The Mini Clearing Serum has approximately 4 weeks worth of product.

settings.title: What active ingredients are in the product?
settings.text:
Skin Shark is an ethical, vegan skin treatment packed full of powerful skin-clearing ingredients. 5Beta-Scymnol.

Our patented, proprietary ingredient has been found to normalise oil production without drying the skin. It is anti-inflammatory and incredibly high in antioxidants. 

Totarol. Derived from the native New Zealand Totara tree, Totarol has incredible antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties.

Bakuchiol. Also known as Sytenol A, this is a plant-based retinol alternative that’s been found to have all the amazing anti-ageing and anti-acne benefits of retinols, but without the irritation and potential for sun sensitivity.

Contacticel. Contacticel attacks pollution on skin, which can contribute to the worsening of acne. It also reduces squalene oxidation and has wonderful anti-inflammatory effects.

settings.description: This one-step serum is designed for everyday use on blemish prone skin. It restores your skin’s ecosystem naturally and is a triple threat against bacteria, irritated skin and excess oils.
